description: React component 'Result' that displays the matched character, description, and generated mashup image. Handles loading, error states, and provides options to download or share the generated image.

methods.name: Result()
methods.description: Main React functional component displaying the result of the character match, including image, description, and sharing options.

methods.name: download
methods.description: Function to fetch the mashup image and trigger a download.

methods.name: shareNative
methods.description: Function to share the mashup image URL via Web Share API or copy link to clipboard.
